column4: Hi, I'm remotly logged into a server, I need to determain if it has 2threads running or 2 real cores. How can I check this?
> Is your server processor dual core ?
I wonder if there is some command to check it ... inside the os
> how many "processor" value do you have ?
so, is it two.. hyperthreading threads or 2 real cores?
> I don't know, it can either be hyperthreading or dual core, but i don't know
> cat /proc/cpuinfo in model name, what is it ?
> You have a real dual cpre processor
> All processors since Core 2 Duo are dual core, so, yeah, i'm sure
